channel.title: TIMELESS MIXES - mixed by DJ River. (Ambient, Chillout, House..)
channel.description:
River Eden aka DJ River is a talented dj from Sweden, born in 1979. Foremost among the reasons DJ River has become so popular is his way of picking and blending the tracks he uses in his mixes - you will rarely see a dj who chooses his tracks as carefully as DJ River does. He is also known for his devotion to create a strong emotional experience for the listener in every mix he creates.
So get ready and let your mind travel far away on this timeless journey through mind and soul, time and space. Enjoy life!
More info at www.DJRiver.com

image.title: TIMELESS MIXES - mixed by DJ River. (Ambient, Chillout, House..)

item.title: Sunseeker & Robert Miles - Sky Is The Limit vs. One & One (DJ River MashUp)
item.description: Remix/MashUp description¬ Enjoy this beach house experiment between Robert Miles famous hit 'One & One' and Sunseeker's ibiza track 'Sky Is The Limit' /DJ River
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: The FreshAir Sessions Vol. 1 (2011) - mixed by DJ River (funky house)
item.description:
Mix description¬ Premiere for a new genre.. funky house, london style! -I got inspired to make this mix after a visit to London and the famous night club 'FIRE' back in 2006. In this first mix I want to take you back in time, and bring back those memorable club nights! In the coming sessions, I will progress into more of today's funky house, but in the same london style! ;) Enjoy! /DJ River
REVIEW: I've just finished listening to all the songs from the FreshAir Session Vol. 1 on youtube individually. Before you had mixed them that is. :) I did this to get a real sense of appreciation for all your work you put into your mixes. You transform all these songs into something else entirely, purely in a positive and improved way. While the originals sound good, the way you mix, mingle, and create these mixes makes them completely unique. I have already lost count as to how many times i have listened to the FreshAir mix now haha. /Michael Owens, USA
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Shakedown & Leftfield - At Night vs. Snakeblood (DJ River MashUp)
item.description: Remix/MashUp description¬ -A powerful mashup between Leftfield's 'Snakeblood' v/s Shakedown's classic hit 'At Night' Enjoy! /DJ River
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Snap! & Paduraru - Exterminate vs Masterpiece (DJ River MashUp)
item.description: Remix/Mashup description¬ -My very first mashup remix! You might recognize the lyrics in this one, from the classic tune from the 90's eurodance band Snap! - 'Exterminate'. In this mashup the tune is based on the newer electronic artist Cristian Paduraru - 'Masterpiece'. Enjoy. /DJ River
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Shapeshifters - Lola's Theme (DJ River ChillHouse Mix)
item.description:
REVIEW: Starts with high quality sounds, very nice atmosphere. Melodies are great overall, guitars, bass etc. are nicely balanced with each other. Brass sections work aswell. I didn't remember the original song right away, but now it came my mind, very nice going in this remix. Drums are mostly basic, but simple is beautiful here. Bass drum is soft enough and fits perfectly to the songs atmosphere. Other sounds fit in nicely also. Overall work very well and the track sounds pro from beginning to end. Very nice remix and atmosphere is just great. Vocals are professional of course. Very very enjoyable and smooth track.
/Jarkko Saikkonen (Finland)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: The Resolver - mixed by DJ River (progressive house)
item.description:
REVIEW: Awesome tunes. Top notch complication. VERY A++ MIX. 100% Trancy, good bass lines and sweet synths as for me. Super subsonic, very professional detail oriented mix. Keep up the GREAT WORK DJ!!! Greeting form Las Vegas, NV.
/Deschtroyer, 24 (USA)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: The Reminder - mixed by DJ River (progressive house)
item.description:
REVIEW: Infectious and addictive. Smooth, seamless, and thematically consistent. Energetic and cool at the same time. Great for dancing, driving, running, walking...breathing. Excellent work again, River.
/Patrick (Canada)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Chill House Mix 5 - mixed by DJ River (pure chillhouse)
item.description:
REVIEW: Excellent. Completely excellent. Relaxing, chilling, energizing music from River. Jazzy house tracks, pure vocals, every track is awesome. Honestly, I wouldn't be able to describe a better house/lounge mix for my taste.
/Sergiu, 20 (Canada)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Chill House Mix 4 - mixed by DJ River (pure chillhouse)
item.description:
REVIEW: What more can I say. River takes us on another journey through chill house music. Going deeper into our minds with pulsating bass and crisp highs...Smooth as ever River. Right back at ya...
/Breckerbros (USA)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Chill House Mix 3 - mixed by DJ River (pure chillhouse)
item.description:
REVIEW: It's just awesome, love it, only those words come out of my mouth.
/Robert Francisco
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Chill House Mix 2 - mixed by DJ River (pure chillhouse)
item.description:
REVIEW: A wonderful journey through the mind, going where only you can be taken. I love it!
/sog_man
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Chill House Mix 1 - mixed by DJ River (pure chillhouse)
item.description:
REVIEW: Another beautiful trip. Recommended on subway or train transfers, a must have on your ipod.
/Davede, 23 (Italy)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: The Gold Room - mixed by DJ River (chillout/lounge)
item.description: Mix description¬ Finally it's time to go on yet another great musical journey á la DJ River. This journey is designed to take you to many different parts of the world with a rich & theatrical sound. Just like the soundtrack to a wonderful movie. Enjoy! /DJ River
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: The Red Room - mixed by DJ River (chillout/lounge)
item.description:
REVIEW: Excellent music! Could listen to this again and again, excellent mixing and some very good songs, its takes you on a ride, relaxes you and makes you smile :o) Very recommendable!!
/Christian, 24 (Denmark)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: The Blue Room - mixed by DJ River (chillout/lounge)
item.description:
REVIEW: The Blue Room is a timeless piece that is soothing and uplifting. Tracks are exquisitvely unique and spacious in a limitless manner. DJ River has a flavour of his known and his integrity will obviously never be compromised.
/Site Manager at TheFreshPage.com (Canada)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: The Purple Room - mixed by DJ River (chillout/lounge)
item.description:
REVIEW: The mix has become an instant classic in my collection. Your mixing is flawless...every song flows into the next, as if they were written and composed by the same artist. Your track selections are well thought out, and this is a perfect mix for anyone coming home after a stressful day. Definitely something to relax to. You've done it again DJ River. Keep up the great work.
/Paul D, 23 (USA)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: The Green Room - mixed by DJ River (chillout/lounge)
item.description:
REVIEW: WOW! Absolutely blown away by this mix...truly deserves its place in my book somewhere in the top 5 lounge mixes ever made!
/Valentino, 18 (Italy)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: The Orange Room - mixed by DJ River (chillout/lounge)
item.description:
REVIEW: This is high end Buddha Bar music. Smooth as ever, the music takes me to another world. Sit back, smoke a bone and enjoy the listening pleasure of DJ River. You've done it again guy. Power my mind with music.
/breckerbros (USA)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Ambient Chillout Vol. 6 - mixed by DJ River (chilled emotions)
item.description:
REVIEW: Once again the miestro of surreal music and orchestrated a collection of pieces sure to elevate you right out of your seat. Each hand-picked selection takes you through a auditory journey that captivates your very presence and commands your attention, yet in a subtle and provocative way just so you senses are teased by a merry-go-round of sweet esoteric dreams. Once you awaken from your subconscience slumber you will feel refreshed and invigorated!
/Jeff, 25 (USA)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Ambient Chillout Vol. 5 - mixed by DJ River (chilled emotions)
item.description:
REVIEW: One word to describe this masterpiece: Euphoric! This piece alleviates you to an emotional plateau that's almost trancendant in nature and takes you on a journey only you can imagine! Absolutely wild and mentally stimulating. Intelligent musique! :))
/HEvans, 23 (Malaysia)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Ambient Chillout Vol. 4 - mixed by DJ River (chilled emotions)
item.description:
REVIEW: And yet again DJ River takes us on a wondrous journey of mind, soul and introspection. Fabulous, magnificient and simply outstanding mix. DJ River, my hat is off to you, with this Mix, you've simply outdone yourself.
/Pakna (Croatia)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Ambient Chillout Vol. 3 - mixed by DJ River (chilled emotions)
item.description:
REVIEW: Finally, a chillout mix that is naturally relaxing. I stumbled across this mix while trying to find some soothing house, this is class man. Some 'chilled' mixes tend to drag on as they TRY to be relaxing, this mix just IS relaxing...great work!
/Vimlit
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Ambient Chillout Vol. 2 - mixed by DJ River (chilled emotions)
item.description:
REVIEW: Now we can see the imagination evolve into a more complex interweaving of ideas beyond ACM1, setting the stage for 3 and 4. A beautiful blend, with a very elevated (at times spacey) feel. The cross-fades are astonishingly exquisite.
/Patrick (Canada)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Ambient Chillout Vol. 1 - mixed by DJ River (chilled emotions)
item.description:
REVIEW: What a simply wonderful mix. It is exquisite! What a blend of orchestration and vocals! Gave me chills at time it was so moving.. Thanks so much for your magic.
/Dave (USA)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Liquid Nonsense Vol. 1 - mixed by DJ River (mysterious psychill/ambient)
item.description:
REVIEW: Dont expect to jump around the room to this music, dont expect constant, pumping baselines. What you get in DJ Rivers Liquid Nonsense Vol. 1 is a cruisy glide through the spectral realm of Ambient & Psychill. It's relaxing at times, with deep throbs sounding like heartbeats underneath chime-like piano samples; at other places it is like a cold and foreign world. Liquid Nonsense Vol. 1 wont give you the same old tunes you may expect from DJ River, but it will hopefully excite and intrigue you with the fore-taste of Rivers new adventure into a refreshing genre of electronic music.
/Iain, 25 (New Zealand)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: The Mind Expander (Part II) - mixed by DJ Espe (deepchill/ambient)
item.description:
REVIEW: Pure relaxation. Drifting, senuous and emotionally sequential. Espe has the ability to traverse the entire network of chill, taking you from thoughtfulness to sublime enlightenment. Part II of the Mind Expander will dance across your skin like a subtle breeze and leave you refreshed and revitalized. Excellent work!
/Timothy, 27 (USA)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: The Mind Expander (Part I) - mixed by DJ River (deepchill/ambient)
item.description:
REVIEW: Smooth, mature and impressively thought out. Seamless movement and agile transitions make for a dreamlike experience. DJ River demonstrates his mastery over sound and feeling, captivating the mind and caressing the senses. Fall into a soft, deep armchair and be embraced by the music. Perfection.
/Timothy, 27 (USA)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Chicane Anthology Vol. 2 - mixed by DJ River (euphoric house/trance)
item.description:
REVIEW: Absolutely marvellous and outstanding! i Chicane is my favourite musician and your mix is really NICE :) Moreover, what is really important after listening it hundreds of time it is still not boring . Pure energy, wind of freedom and sth flowing in the air! GREaT joB !
/hUud (Poland)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Chicane Anthology Vol. 1 - mixed by DJ River (euphoric house/trance)
item.description:
REVIEW: As a long time Chicane fan and a DJ, I can detect the enormous amount of work and respect that has gone into this set. Absolutely stunning!
/DJ Lurk - www.djlurk.com - (USA)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Deep Tech House Mix 2 - mixed by DJ River (techy progressive house)
item.description:
REVIEW: Awesome!! It builds and builds whilst remaining calm and sophisticated. Each track sounds better than the one before, I've only ever heard Breaks do that before. Genius! DJKJ.
/Kelly Jackson (UK)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Deep Tech House Mix 1 - mixed by DJ River (techy progressive house)
item.description:
REVIEW: This is probabably one of the best tech house sets i've ever heard. Your mixing is just crazy! Keep up the good work sir :)
/Marco (Cyprus)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Deep Psychedelic Trip Mix 1 - mixed by DJ River (trippy house/trance)
item.description:
REVIEW: Very nice atmospheric start, reminiscent of Banco De Gaia. Slowly builds up into a perfectly blended set. Paced enough for a seasoned follower of Psy and accessible enough for those who have not dabbled in the genre before. I rate this set very highly. :)
/Sephiroth (UK)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com

item.title: Thrill Trance Experience - mixed by DJ River (euphoric trance)
item.description:
-:Thrillseekers Tribute:-
REVIEW: Hey DJ River, first of all I would like to say "Thank You" for this brilliant mix! I haven't listened to trance music for more than 1 1/2 years. Now, at the beginning of your mix, I really started crying, because "Dreaming Of You" is one of my favourite songs! I really love your mix because I keep thinking at the only person, I deeply love. :) Best wishes,
/André (Germany)
item.author: djriver@djriver.com
